item.title: Gymnast Gabby Douglas takes another victory on road back to Olympics
item.description:
Gymnast Gabby Douglas takes another victory on road back to Olympics

On a day when Gabby Douglas continued to make progress toward a return to the Olympics, two young American gymnasts put in a strong showing as they start a path to trying to make the U.S. team.

item.title: Girls' Legos Are A Hit, But Why Do Girls Need Special Legos?
item.description:
Girls' Legos Are A Hit, But Why Do Girls Need Special Legos?

Two years ago, in 2011, 90 percent of Lego's consumers were boys. A tough statistic to swallow for those of us who grew up playing with Lego's gender-neutral buckets of bricks.

item.title: Help Your Daughter Face Her Fears with 2016 Girl Of The Year™ Lea
item.description:
Help Your Daughter Face Her Fears with 2016 Girl Of The Year™ Lea

The next chapter of Lea's adventure comes to life on the screen as she heads back to Brazil to rescue her brother and endangered animals from a band of ruthless poachers. Available for Digital Download 5/31 and on Blu-Ray and DVD 6/14.Learn about the American Girl brand and connect with your girl on our new Explore page.
